meanings.definition: Producing or capable of producing a great amount of sound.
meanings.sent1: The lion's roar was the loudest in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The concert was so loud, but the loudest band was yet to perform.
meanings.sent3: The loudest alarm clock couldn't wake him up on time.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the loudest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm was so loud, it felt like the loudest drum beating in the sky.

meanings.definition: To the greatest degree or extent.
meanings.sent1: She cheered the loudest for her favorite team.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered loudest when the fireworks lit up the sky.
meanings.sent3: He laughed loudest at his own joke, not realizing it wasn't that funny.
meanings.sent4: The river loudest after heavy rainfall, rushing through the valley.
meanings.sent5: Her heart beat loudest when she stood on the edge of the cliff, feeling the thrill of heights.
